EmailTemplate.description: Thank you for standing with America's veterans
EmailTemplate.name: Thanks for standing with IAVA
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for standing with IAVA
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
We will not tolerate an attack on a fellow veteran's service.
Thank you for standing with Iraq and Afghanistan Veterans of America. IAVA is America's leading post-9/11 veterans group. Please support our critical programs now and in the important years ahead. Make a $10 donation by going to http://iava.org/donate
Learn more about our programs by going to http://iava.org/programs
Post-9/11 Vets: become an IAVA member for free by going to http://iava.org/#join and spread the word to you family and friends. Together, we can support America's most promising leaders--and show everyone that veterans are not a charity, we're an investment.
